page.name: Paulus et al. 2002, Andersen et al. 2011, Cherkin et al. 2009, Langevin et al. 2006
page.content:
Read the following articles and be prepared to discuss the following:

  1. What protocol was used in the Paulus et al study?
  2. What protocol was used in the Andersen et al study?
  3. How does the Paulus study differ from the Andersen study?Â  Are those differences enough to account for the outcomes?
  4. When clinical trials report opposing results, what should a clinician do?
  5. How does the sham control in the Cherkin et al study affect the statistics used to report efficacy?
  • Paulus et al 2002 article
  • Andersen et al 2010 article
  • Cherkin et al 2009 article
  • Langevin et al 2006 article
